rs:sqlResource.name: HierManyToManyExt
rs:sqlResource.query: select actor.actor_id, first_name, last_name, actor_genre_id, actor_genre.name, film.film_id, title, release_year "year", film_rating_id, stars from actor left outer join actor_genre on actor.actor_id = actor_genre.actor_id left outer join film_actor on film_actor.actor_id = actor.actor_id left outer join film on film_actor.film_id = film.film_id left outer join film_rating on film_actor.film_id = film_rating.film_id
